reviews.review_text: When I initially read the reviews of, 'This is the new Ghosts n Goblins.' I sighed and thought, oh suuuuuuuuuuuuure. But to my pleasent surprise, it was. Like said before me, quite a bit in this game is obviously inspried by the Ghosts n Goblins/Ghouls n Ghosts series. Even with the lame weapons (axe).  The magic feature of the Seven God/Dieties in-game is pretty cool and that power-up brought back flashbacks of Ghouls n Ghosts.  If you like old school difficult, but fair in it's execution. Check this out. If it's on sale, it's a must buy.  My only complaint is the lack of save feature; which is minor, but for many modern players, it's a major downside.  I suppose another downside for those interested it the lack of Trading Cards. I hope this gets updated so trading cards are added.

Fun. Worth $20. Feels like Ghosts & Goblins. Has a Demo.  Better than <insert some other game you've played recently>. Achievments require actually being 'good' instead of just being a warm body.  Bonus: Keep your weapon upgrade(s) after dying (which you probably will).  Have played again.
Very, Very Fun. One of the best games I have ever played for a long time! LOVE IT SO MUCH  Keep Up the good work Dev!
Nice game. Feels Ghouls & Ghosts (but with better controls) coupled with Magician Lord (NEO GEO).
terrible control game... some people might like this challenge game,  I surly don't coz I tried 30 mins and couldn't even pass 1st level, and it seriously drop percentage of my total achievement

I wouldn't recommend this game. It has enough content for good potential but with so many other fantastic retro side-scroller platformers on Steam there isn't any reason to play this one. Voice acting is bad enough that text-only would have been better, sounds are repetitive, and the level design is boring. The initial bosses can be defeated by just standing out of their fire range and taking pot shots at them.  Edit: Playtime is high because after I closed the game part of it kept running in the background and I didn't realize it until the next day.
They tried, but not hard enough. Some people will like this, but I sure don't.
A rough around the edges game in the style of Super Ghouls N Ghosts. Not terrible, but not amazing either. The level design and platforming mechanics need work. 6/10
